name: Rome Rush
description:
Updates for historically accurate game jam :

-Enemies spawn at a slower rate

-Music is quieter and sound effects are louder

-Better particle system 

Hello everyone!  This is my submission for the minijam 51.  The theme of this gamejam was Rome, and the limitation being that the player must be the villain.  This was the first gamejam I ever participated in, and the first full game I made!  It was an amazing experience and I hope you enjoy :).

The game follows the evil child Maximus, destined to murder all of the vegetables for the sake of all the children.  Watching innocent vegetables be destroyed, "Julius" Caesar salad creates an army of "Rome"aine lettuces to fight the child.  Will you be able to use your burger blaster to survive the endless onslaught of vegetables?

Comment your high score down in the comment sections!  My best was a score of 2510.
